Package com.jml.optimizers

Class TimeDecay

java.lang.Object
com.jml.optimizers.Scheduler
com.jml.optimizers.TimeDecay
public class TimeDecay extends Scheduler
TimeDecay is a Scheduler that decays the learning rate through time. That is, decays the learning rate over epochs.

The following rule is applied by the TimeDecay Scheduler: 
      learning_rate = learning_rate / (1 + decay*epoch)
By default, decay = initial_learning_rate / total_epochs but a custom value can be specified.
